name: 高淩菁
objective: 本課程的重點在於闡述統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含概念介紹、敘述統計、機率理論、推論統計。另有統計學的應用領域於推論未知的情況以作為相關決策之依據，並包含統計軟體使用介紹。
schedule:
週次	日期	        課程大綱進度
1	9/15	        Course overview & Ch1
2	9/22	        Ch2  Organizing and Visualizing Data (1) 
3	9/29	        Ch2  Organizing and Visualizing Data (2)
4	10/6	        Ch3  Numerical Descriptive Measures (1)
5	10/13	Ch3  Numerical Descriptive Measures (2)
6	10/20	Ch4  Basic Probability (1)
7	10/27	Ch4  Basic Probability (2)
8	11/3	        Exam1
9	11/10	 Ch 5  Discrete Probability Distributions (1)       
10	11/17	 Ch 5  Discrete Probability Distributions (2)      
11	11/24	 Ch 6  Continuous Probability Distributions (1)      
12	12/1	         Ch 6  Continuous Probability Distributions (2)
13	12/8	         Exam 2
14	12/15	 Ch 7  Sampling Distributions (1)
15	12/22	 Ch 7  Sampling Distributions (2)
16	12/29	 Ch 8 Confidence Interval Estimation
17	1/5	         Ch 8 Confidence Interval Estimation
18	1/12	         Exam 3
scorePolicy:
In-class quiz: 5% 	
Exam1: 25%	
Exam2: 25%	
Exam3: 25%
統計會考: 20%
materials: Basic Business Statistics: Concept and Applications, by Berenson, Levine, and Krehbiel, 13th Edition
